filepermissions-access-denied: Error message shown when a user tries to view a file page they do not have permission to access.
filepermissions-img-denied: Error message shown when a user tries to stream or download a file they do not have permission to access (via img_auth.php).
filepermissions-upload-label: Label for the permission level dropdown on the file upload form.
filepermissions-upload-help: Help text shown below the permission level dropdown on the file upload form.
filepermissions-upload-choose: Placeholder option in the permission level dropdown prompting the user to select a level.
filepermissions-upload-required: Error message shown when the user submits an upload without selecting a permission level.
filepermissions-upload-invalid: Error message shown when the user submits an upload with a permission level that is not valid.
filepermissions-level-label: Label displayed next to the current permission level on a file page and in the edit dropdown.
filepermissions-edit-save: Label for the save button when editing a file's permission level on the file page.
filepermissions-edit-success: Success notification shown after a file's permission level is updated.
filepermissions-edit-error: Error notification shown when updating a file's permission level fails.
filepermissions-log-name: Name of the file permission log as shown in Special:Log.
filepermissions-log-header: Header text shown at the top of the file permission log page.
logentry-fileperm-change:
Log entry format for permission level changes. Parameters:
* $1 - user link
* $2 - user name (for GENDER)
* $3 - file page link
* $4 - old permission level
* $5 - new permission level
filepermissions-api-nosuchpage: API error message returned when the specified file page does not exist.
right-edit-fileperm: {{int:right-edit-fileperm}} - User right to change file permission levels.
filepermissions-msupload-label: Label for the permission level dropdown injected into the MsUpload interface.
filepermissions-msupload-error-nolevels: Error message shown in the MsUpload interface when permission levels could not be loaded from the API.
filepermissions-msupload-error-save:
Warning shown in the MsUpload interface when a file was uploaded but its permission level may not have been saved. Parameters:
* $1 - file name
filepermissions-ve-label: Label for the permission level dropdown injected into the VisualEditor media upload dialog.
filepermissions-ve-error-nolevels: Error message shown in the VisualEditor upload dialog when permission levels could not be loaded from the API.
filepermissions-ve-error-save:
Warning shown in the VisualEditor upload dialog when a file was uploaded but its permission level may not have been saved. Parameters:
* $1 - file name
